title: Miss Fortune (Small) Missing Animation
body:
_Disclaimers: - I know some people will not care about such a simple thing, I'm sorry.
- Also, I'm sorry if this is fixed in the most recent patch, I didn't see it in the patch notes._

When Miss Fortune got a model update, she got both updated and new animations. Her new animations are transition animations (which I think are called -ins and -outs internally by Riot).

Then, when she got updated again in the Marksmen update, she lost one of these animations: her "ult-to-idle".
However, she didn't lose it in either her Arcade or Captain Fortune skins, only in her oldest skins.

I'll show you with some gifs of Mafia Miss Fortune and Arcade Miss Fortune.

[[Here since I don't know how to hotlink images.]](http://imgur.com/a/hgn78)

Also, Arcade used to have two sound effects for Love Tap, a "beep" and a "boop". But recently, only her "beep" gets played, never the other sound.

Would it be possible for you guys to check it, please?

Thank you! ^^

replies.body: The fact that you noticed this is pretty awesome, good find. The community helping to find even the little things that need fixing puts a smile on my face.
Forwarding this to the right people

You've just become my favorite Rioter ever.

Thank you so much!

Hotlink by opening image in new tab and using that URL
liek dis
